content: The geeks have risen, we are in demand and have the freedom and power to pick and choose the role we want. For a group of individuals who were likely marginalised and made to feel weak and insignificant as children, this is a powerful and seductive feeling. The gung-ho attitude of many startups can exacerbate and manipulate these feelings to fever point. Making you honestly feel like you are changing the world and that the world owes you a favour, when you’re actually making another damned dating app.
